Description.Text: The Newton Hotel is located eight miles from La Guardia Airport in the Upper West Side of Manhattan, N.Y. Riverside Park and Central Park are within three blocks of the hotel, and Columbia University and Lincoln Center are within two miles. This smoke-free hotel offers reasonably-priced accommodations in a quiet neighborhood filled with quaint brownstone buildings. Tours of the city can be booked at the hotel's 24-hour front desk. The lobby business center features high-speed Internet access with print, fax and photocopy services.

• Central Park - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi • Tom's Diner - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi • Rose Center for Earth and Space - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi • American Museum of Natural History - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi • Solomon R. Guggenheim Museum - 1.6 km / 1 mi • Metropolitan Museum of Art - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi • Columbia University - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi • Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi • Rockefeller Plaza - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi • Broadway - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi • Times Square - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi • Grand Central Terminal - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi • Chrysler Building - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi • Empire State Building - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi • Brooklyn Bridge - 10.2 km / 6.3 mi

This New York hotel has 105 guestrooms, all of which feature wireless Internet access (surcharge), TVs with premium cable channels, and dual-line telephones. Guestrooms also offer microwaves and compact refrigerators. Smoking is not permitted. Decor features mahogany furniture, including small desks; floral bedspreads with matching drapes; recessed lighting; floral prints on walls; and mahogany crown molding.
Hotel Amenities: • AAA approved • In-house nightclub • 24-hour front desk • High-speed wi-fi access • 100% non-smoking

Central Park, three blocks east of Newton Hotel, offers a variety of recreational opportunities, including ball fields, tennis courts, rowboat rentals, horseback riding, ice skating in winter, and miles of trails for hiking, biking, running, and in-line skating. Newton Hotel guests receive a discount at a sports-and-racquet club across the street.The recreational activities listed below are available either on site or near the hotel; fees may apply.
Nearby Activities: • Aerobics • Hiking/biking trails • Horse riding/rental • Ice skating • Pilates classes/instruction • Racquetball/squash • Rowing or canoeing • Running track/path • Swimming • Tennis • Yoga classes/instruction
• Pets not allowed • Check-in time is 2 PM • Check-out time is Noon

The Newton Hotel does not have its own restaurant, but there are several dining options within the surrounding Upper West Side area.
Nearby restaurants: • Lemongrass Grill • La Nueva Victoria • Kay West Diner Key West Diner offers breakfast, lunch, and dinner room service without delivery charge.
This 2 star hotel is located in the city centre of New York. It is a short drive away from the Rockefeller Center.
